'''Trails & Tales''' is a major update released on June 7, 2023 as [[Java Edition 1.20]] and [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.0]].<ref>{{Mcnet|trails-tales-update-coming|The Trails & Tales update is coming|May 26, 2023|Sofia Dankis, Sophie Austi}}</ref> Its theme is "creativity and self-expression through representation and storytelling", focusing mostly on decorative blocks, customization options and resources for player-driven in-game storytelling and roleplay. It introduces [[armor trim]]s, [[trail ruins]], mobs like the [[camel]] and [[sniffer]], the [[archaeology]] system, the [[cherry grove]] biome, and other features. The name of the update was revealed in ''[[Minecraft Monthly]]'' on March 2, 2023.<ref>{{Ytl|jQ58UEXrFzs|1.20 NAME REVEAL and more &vert; MINECRAFT MONTHLY|Minecraft|2 March 2023}}</ref>

Experimental features for this update would be released prior to the finalized release as part of [[1.19.3]] and [[1.19.4]] on {{JE}}, and as part of [[1.19.50]], [[1.19.60]], [[1.19.70]], and [[1.19.80]] on {{BE}}.

== Additions ==

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Calibrated Sculk Sensor.png|32px]] [[Calibrated sculk sensor]]'''
* Crafted using a sculk sensor and three [[amethyst shard]]s.
* Can be used to filter vibrations.

'''[[File:Chiseled Bookshelf.png|32px]] [[Chiseled bookshelf]]'''
* Crafted using six wooden planks and three wooden slabs.
* Can store books, enchanted books, written books, and book and quills.

'''[[File:Decorated Pot.png|32px]] [[Decorated pot]]'''
* Crafted using bricks or [[pottery sherd]]s.

'''{{Animate|Oak Hanging Sign.png; Dark Oak Hanging Sign.png; Cherry Hanging Sign.png; Birch Hanging Sign.png; Jungle Hanging Sign.png; Mangrove Hanging Sign.png; Spruce Hanging Sign.png; Acacia Hanging Sign.png; Bamboo Hanging Sign.png; Crimson Hanging Sign.png; Warped Hanging Sign.png|32px}} [[Hanging sign]]s of all wood types'''
* Crafted using six [[stripped log]]s and two [[chain]]s.
* Can be placed on the wall or ceiling.

'''[[File:Piglin Head.png|32px]] [[Piglin head]]'''
* Obtained from [[piglins]] killed from [[charged creeper]]s.

'''[[File:Sniffer Egg.png|32px]] [[Sniffer egg]]'''
* Found by brushing [[suspicious sand]] in [[warm ocean ruins]].
* Hatches into [[snifflet]]s.

'''[[File:Suspicious Gravel.png|32px]] [[Suspicious gravel]] & [[File:Suspicious Sand.png|32px]] [[suspicious sand]]'''
* Contains loot that can be obtained by using a [[brush]] on it.

** [[File:Bamboo Mosaic Stairs.png|32px]] [[Bamboo mosaic stairs]]
** [[File:Bamboo Mosaic Slab.png|32px]] [[Bamboo mosaic slab]]

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Brush JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Brush]]'''
* Crafted using a [[feather]], a [[copper ingot]], and a [[stick]].
* Used for [[archaeology]].

'''[[File:Pitcher Pod JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Pitcher pod]] & [[File:Torchflower Seeds JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[torchflower seeds]]'''
* Obtained from [[sniffers]].
* Has to be grown like a crop.

* Obtained by brushing suspicious sand or gravel.

'''{{Animate|Sentry Armor Trim Smithing Template JE2 BE2.png;Vex Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Wild Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Coast Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Dune Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Wayfinder Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Raiser Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Shaper Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Host Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Ward Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Silence Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Tide Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Snout Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Rib Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Eye Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png;Spire Armor Trim Smithing Template JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Smithing template]]s'''

'''New [[music disc]]:'''
* [[File:Music Disc Relic JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Music Disc Relic|Aaron Cherof - Relic]]
** Obtained by brushing suspicious gravel in [[trail ruins]].

'''[[Spawn egg]]s:'''
* [[File:Camel Spawn Egg JE2 BE2.png|32px]] [[Camel spawn egg]]
** Used to spawn a [[camel]].
* [[File: Sniffer Spawn Egg JE2 BE2.png|32px]] [[Sniffer spawn egg]]
** Used to spawn a [[sniffer]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Camel.png|32px]] [[Camel]]'''
* Spawns in [[desert]] [[villages]].
* Supports two riders.
* Has the ability to dash.
* Can be bred with [[cactus|cacti]].

'''[[File:Sniffer.png|32px]] [[Sniffer]]'''
* Hatches from [[sniffer egg]]s.
* Digs out [[torchflower seeds]] or [[pitcher pod]]s occasionally.
* Can be bred with torchflower seeds.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:Cherry Boat.png|32px]] [[Cherry boat]]'''
* Including [[File:Cherry Boat with Chest.png|32px]] [[Cherry Boat with Chest|a chest variant]].

'''[[File:Bamboo Raft.png|32px]] [[Bamboo raft]]'''
* Including [[File:Bamboo Raft with Chest.png|32px]] [[Bamboo Raft with Chest|a chest variant]].

=== Biome ===
'''{{BiomeLink|Cherry grove}}'''
* Generates with [[cherry]] trees and [[pink petals]].

=== Structures ===
'''[[File:Cherry Tree JE3.png|32px]] [[Cherry]] tree'''
* A tree that generates on [[cherry grove]].
'''[[File:Trail Ruins.png|32px]] [[Trail ruins]]'''
* A buried structure found in [[taiga]], [[snowy taiga]], [[old growth taiga]]s, [[old growth birch forest]]s, and [[jungle]]s.
* Four armor trims, seven pottery sherds, and a music disc can be found here.

=== Gameplay mechanic ===
'''[[Archaeology]]'''
* Allows the player to find artifacts from suspicious sand or gravel.

=== Music ===
'''Four new ambient tracks from [[Aaron Cherof]] were added; all would play on the main menu until [[Tricky Trials]].'''
* "[[Echo in the Wind]]"
** Plays in [[cherry grove]]s, [[flower forest]]s, [[lush cave]]s, [[old growth taiga]]s, and [[badland]]s.
* "[[A Familiar Room]]"
** Plays in any biome that does not already have a corresponding set of biome-specific music.
* "[[Bromeliad]]"
** Plays in [[badland]]s, [[bamboo jungle]]s, [[cherry grove]]s, [[flower forest]]s, [[forest]]s, [[jungle]]s, [[old growth taiga]]s, and [[sparse jungle]]s.
* "[[Crescent Dunes]]"
** Plays in [[desert]]s and [[badland]]s.

== Changes ==

=== Blocks ===
'''[[Mob head]]s'''
* Can now be placed on [[note block]]s to produce the mob sounds associated.

== Further revisions ==
=== Java Edition ===
* [[Java Edition 1.20.1|1.20.1]] was released to fix critical bugs related to 1.20.
* [[Java Edition 1.20.2|1.20.2]] was released to add the "[[Villager Trade Rebalance]]" experimental toggle and the {{cmd|random}} command, and fix bugs.

=== Bedrock Edition ===
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.1|1.20.1]] was released to fix critical bugs related to 1.20.0.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.10|1.20.10]] was released to bring more parity from {{JE}} and fix bugs.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.12|1.20.12]] was released to fix critical bugs related to 1.20.10.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.13|1.20.13]] was released to fix a crash in 1.20.12.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.14|1.20.14]] was released exclusively on PlayStation to fix a crash in 1.20.13.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.15|1.20.15]] was released to fix a crash in 1.20.13.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.30|1.20.30]] was released to add [[experimental]] changes to the [[villager]] and [[wandering trader]] trades (named "[[Villager Trade Rebalancing]]"), bring more parity from {{JE}}, and fix bugs.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.31|1.20.31]] was released to fix critical bugs related to 1.20.30.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.32|1.20.32]] was released to fix critical bugs related to 1.20.30.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.40|1.20.40]] was released to bring more parity from {{JE}} and fix bugs.
* [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.41|1.20.41]] was released to fix critical bugs related to 1.20.40.

== Promotions ==

=== World ===
{{Main|Timeless Trails}}
[[File:Timeless Trails key art.jpg|thumb|Timeless Trails key art.]]
In promotion of ''Trails & Tales'', a free map was released on the [[Marketplace]]. Produced by ''The Hive'', the map tells the story of an archeologist, who is able to travel through time during the night and recover artifacts during the day, visiting a Desert Bazaar, Cherry Grove, and Ancient Caves in the process. Along the way the player is able to learn various new mechanics featured in the map, including archeology, camels, armor trims, chiseled bookshelves, and growing the sniffer's plants.

=== Event server ===
{{Main|Trails & Tales Event}}
[[File:Trails & Tales Event banner body.jpg|thumb|Player on the server.]]
In promotion of ''Trails & Tales'', a free [[Event servers|event server]] was released. Open from 10 AM PST June 23rd to 10 PM PST June 25th, players could explore many regions with their own minigames, including the Cherry Grove, Camel Canyon, and the Lost World, and earn many exclusive items.

{{Quote|Minecraft Marketplace creators The Hive bring you the Timeless Trails adventure map!
